articles.title: Rio Open: Cameron Norrie wins fifth ATP title with thrilling victory over Carlos Alcaraz
articles.description: British number one Cameron Norrie beats Carlos Alcaraz in a thrilling Rio Open final, just seven days after losing to the Spaniard in the final of the Argentina Open.
articles.content:

Norrie fought back from a set and a break down to win in Rio de Janeiro

articles.title: Argentina mom, partner sentenced in murder of 5-year-old son: reports
articles.description: An Argentinian mom and her female partner accused of killing and sexually abusing the mother’s 5-year-old son were sentenced to life in prison, according to reports.
articles.content:
An Argentinian mom and her female partner accused of killing and sexually abusing the mother’s 5-year-old son were sentenced to life in prison on Wednesday, according to reports.
The Buenos Aires Times reported that Magdalena Espósito Valenti, the mo... [2833 chars]

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE-Argentina in talks with IMF to ease reserves targets amid drought - sources
articles.description: The move comes as the South American commodities exporter is facing the worst drought in 60 years, which has pummeled soy, corn and wheat crops, compromising already weak foreign exchange reserves. Discussions include the impact of the drought on 2023 goals for net reserves, said an Argentina economy ministry adviser who asked not to be named because the talks were ongoing.
articles.content: Argentina's government is in final talks with International Monetary Fund officials to ease foreign exchange reserves targets for 2023 under the country's $44 billion program, two sources close to the matter told Reuters. The move comes as the South ... [2342 chars]

articles.title: Cameron Norrie through to Rio Open semi-finals to set-up possible Carlos Alcaraz rematch in Sunday's final
articles.description: British number one Cameron Norrie beats Bolivias Hugo Dellien 4-6 6-1 6-4; world number two Carlos Alcaraz also through to final four in Rio with 6-4 7-6 (7-0) win over Dusan Lajovic; Norrie and Alcaraz met in last weekends Argentina Open final, which the 19-year-old Spaniard won 6-3 7-5
articles.content:
British number one Cameron Norrie is through to the semi-finals of the Rio Open after a 4-6 6-1 6-4 win over Bolivia's Hugo Dellien on Friday.
Defending champion, and world number two, Carlos Alcaraz also advanced to the final four with a straight-se... [2005 chars]

articles.title: Man United’s ‘too small’ Martinez has silenced his critics
articles.description: In a matter of months, however, the World Cup winner from Argentina has established himself as a bedrock of United's four-pronged trophy challenge and become one of the most dominant defenders in the English Premier League.
articles.content:
